review_text: Nidia's place is very nice and clean with all we needed to have a great stay in Champaign. We were there to visit relatives, so we didn't spend much time in the suite. When there, we were very comfortable. The bathroom was great with plenty of hot water in an excellent shower. We were happy to store a few food items in the refrigerator and were pleased the little freezer kept our frozen item frozen. The little microwave warmed our food nicely. There was a coffee maker with coffee and cups. We used the washer and dryer to do one load of clothes. Just followed Nidia's excellent directions. This was an extra we usually don't have in an AirBnB. She left us hangers on hooks in the bedroom, so we hung our clothes fresh out of the dryer. With the code Nidia gave us, we had easy entry to the basement suite. There were automatic lights on the stairs down into the basement and a sturdy handrail to hold on to. In our 70's, we had no trouble with the short flight of stairs. We were happy to park at the rear of Nidia's house leaving room for her to enter and exit the driveway. We always prefer to have our car parked off the street, so this was ideal for us! Nidia's location is excellent with all services close by. We rarely heard Nidia walking above us, and we slept very well in this quiet neighborhood. Internet service was excellent all of the time we were there. We didn't use the tv because we were there only a short time. We look forward to staying there again when we return to Champaign. Thank you, Nidia!
